A

add(T) - Method in class CargoCompany
Adds a box to the stack of containers.

B

Box<T> - Class in Unnamed Package
The Box class is a container for items that can be sold (Sellable).
Box() - Constructor for class Box
Constructs an empty Box with no item packed.
Box(T, int) - Constructor for class Box
Constructs a Box with the specified item and distance to the delivery address.
boxes - Variable in class Container
An array of Box objects representing the stack of boxes.

C

CargoCompany - Class in Unnamed Package
The CargoCompany class manages a collection of containers and a fleet of cargo.
CargoCompany() - Constructor for class CargoCompany
Constructs a new CargoCompany with an empty stack of containers and an empty cargo fleet.
CargoFleet - Class in Unnamed Package
The CargoFleet class implements a priority queue for managing a fleet of containers.
CargoFleet() - Constructor for class CargoFleet
Constructs an empty CargoFleet with no containers.
Common<T> - Interface in Unnamed Package
The Common interface defines the basic operations for collection-like structures.
compareTo(Container) - Method in class Container
Compares this container with another container based on priority.
Container - Class in Unnamed Package
The Container class implements a stack structure for storing boxes, a node for linked containers, and is comparable based on its priority.
Container() - Constructor for class Container
Constructs an empty Container with a default capacity.

D

DEFAULT_CAPACITY - Static variable in interface Node
The default capacity of a node.
deliver(T) - Method in class CargoCompany
Delivers a box and extracts its contents.
dequeue() - Method in class CargoFleet
Removes and returns the container with the highest priority from the fleet.
dequeue() - Method in interface PriorityQueue
Retrieves and removes the head of this queue, or returns null if this queue is empty.
distanceToAddress - Variable in class Box
The distance to the delivery address, used in priority calculation.

empty(Container) - Method in class CargoCompany
Empties a container by delivering all the boxes within it.

Extracts and returns the item from the box, if any.

Extracts and returns the item contained within the Matroschka, if any.
extract() - Method in interface Package
Extracts an item from the package.

FLEET_CAPACITY - Static variable in interface PriorityQueue
